mean_cn: n. 用户电报，电传打字机
mean_en: a system of communication in which messages are sent over long distances by using a telephone system and are printed by using a special machine (called a teletypewriter)
sentence: "Hello sir, you've got a telex message." "It's 2012, why don't they send me an email?!"
sentence_trans: “先生，您好。你有一份电报。”现在已经2012年了，他们为什么不使用电子邮件？”
